data.name: Paint Warfare
data.detailed_description:
Paint Warfare is the fastest, wildest and most adrenaline-packed multiplayer FPS you’ll ever experience.

With wall climbing, grenade jumping and hyper-fast movement, you can explore virtually any point in the maps.


Key Points:


  • Wacky movement— incredible speed, grenade jumping, dashes and wall climbing
  • Every weapon is unique— from orange grenades to banana guns and shotgun pistols, every weapon is different
  • Maps— although there are currently 3, many more are in the works :)
  • Easy to play with friends— available on both itch.io and steam and friendly on beginners, the maps allow for anything from a simple duel to a massive paint brawl



Paint Warfare— Play without limits

data.short_description: Paint Warfare is the fastest, wildest and most adrenaline-packed multiplayer FPS you’ll ever experience. With wall climbing, grenade jumping and hyper-fast movement, you can explore virtually any point in the maps.
data.supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Russian, French, German, Dutch, Polish
data.reviews:
“It's still Early Access, so expect bugs, but the lead developer is a great guy and community is really nice too! There's a huge amount of potential in this already. So don't wait, this is a hypetrain you want to be on!”
Recommended – Hare Ware

“This game has a lot of potential. The dev, [bananadev], is an experienced video game developer, and is very passionate about this project. He continues to better it and turn it into a fully-fledged shooter, with each new update bringing in a plethora of new features. This may soon be a contender for the hit FPS game Ravenfield.”
5/5 – Ringer-53

“I would totally recommend this game”
Recommended – Me

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 64-bit, 2 GHz or Faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 64-bit, 3 GHz or Faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
